locations.title: Arc Thrift - Arvada
locations.description:
From its humble beginnings in 1950, Arc Thrift Stores has grown to become a major player in the charitable industry, now running more than 700 chapters around the country.

Donations accepted at their many chapters include clothing, household items, and jewelry. If you're not sure whether your donations will be accepted, please give them a call beforehand.
locations.address: 12345 W 58th Ave, Arvada, CO 80002, USA

locations.title: Salvation Army - Boulder
locations.description:
The Salvation Army was founded in London in 1865. Since then it has grown into a global charitable organization, currently serving in 130 countries.

Financial donations are more than welcome, but they also accept goods such as clothing, houseware, home appliances, furniture, and others. If you're not sure whether they can accept your donation, please give them a call beforehand.
locations.address: 1701 33rd St, Boulder, CO 80301, USA
